description:
The International Service Organization (ISO) of Sex Addicts Anonymous (SAA), Inc. offers referrals to 12-step recovery meetings for people who have a desire to recover from sexually compulsive or addictive behavior. Meetings are located all over the world with the majority being in North America. Meetings are held seven days a week at all times of the day. Meeting formats include face-to-face, telephone, and web-based options. The ISO does NOT offer telephone counseling nor is it a u0022hotline.u0022 Interested parties will be referred to a meeting in his/her area or a telephone/web-based meeting for assistance.

###COL###
name: SEX ADDICTS ANONYMOUS, INC.
